summary: "Cars" is a 2006 animated comedy by Pixar about a race car named Lightning McQueen who gets stranded in a small town called Radiator Springs. He learns about friendship and changes his selfish ways. The movie was directed by John Lasseter and features voices like Owen Wilson and Paul Newman. It's set in a world where cars are like people. "Cars" was a big hit, making over $462 million worldwide. It led to two sequels and spin-off films.
title: Cars (film)
